name: Beast
description: Barbarians whose rage releases a feral transformation guided by a primal spirit.

3.name: Form of the Beast
3.description: When you rage, manifest natural weapons—bite, claws, or tail—each granting unique benefits and counting as simple melee weapons.

6.name: Bestial Soul
6.description: Your natural weapons count as magical. After a rest choose a benefit: swim and breathe underwater, climb difficult surfaces, or extend jumps.

10.name: Infectious Fury
10.description: When you hit with a natural weapon while raging, force a Wisdom save or have the target attack another creature or take 2d12 psychic damage. Uses equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

14.name: Call the Hunt
14.description: When you rage, choose creatures equal to your Constitution modifier to gain 5 temporary hit points. Until the rage ends, they can add 1d6 damage once per turn. Uses equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.
